Frequently asked questions about our computer services
How long does virus removal take?

Most virus removals take 30-60 minutes. Password resets typically take 15-30 minutes, computer optimization takes 30-45 minutes, and full system cleanups take 45-60 minutes. We complete services on-site while you wait.
Do you come to my location?

Yes! We're a 100% mobile service covering all of Dallas-Fort Worth. We come to your home, office, coffee shop, or any safe public location. Our service area includes Dallas, Fort Worth, Plano, Frisco, Irving, Arlington, and surrounding cities within a 30-mile radius.

All services come with our satisfaction guarantee. If you experience any issues with the service we provided, we'll return to fix it at no additional charge. We guarantee complete virus removal and full password recovery on all supported systems.
